skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.
Sky Lanterns are used by the Dragon’s armies to observe enemies from on high.
The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Land the size of Grand Cathay requires a pragmatic custodian.
This leader imparts his knowledge to the battalion, and they are willing to learn.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Dragon Emperor guides every sword and spear of the norther provinces, inspiring a strength of arms to match an unflinching strength of will.

skillTree.localised_description: From lowly peasant to expert marksman, every arrow of the east soars with a Draconic power and grace.

skillTree.localised_description: Ancient Cathay stands historically unconquered. Booming cannons and rockets of exploding fire help ensure it will remain so.

skillTree.localised_description: When fire hangs in the sky above the battlefield, death is sure to rain down upon it.

skillTree.localised_description: Cathayan armies have been tested time and again, their skills proven in a tumultuous arena of bloodshed and near-constant war.

skillTree.localised_description: A blanket of glowing lights amidst the clouds is sure to stir the heart of every Cathayan warrior beneath them.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
All warriors of honour and pride are eager to fight under the Dragon-Emperor's banners.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
Every wound that is not fatal is but a lesson to learn from.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: The blood-soaked battlefields of the northern provinces are the proving grounds upon which the mightiest warriors of Cathay have honed their craft.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.
Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.
An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
Fury simmers just barely below the surface, begging to be released.
A person's word should be their bond, and shame on those that would break it.
If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.
This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.
If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.
What will not bend may sometimes break.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
